title: WHERE IS MY LOST PREVENTION???
body: recent game the entire team everyone had a server DC and we all end up getting a loss fuck you riot.

replies.body: Loss prevented doesn't work on an individual basis. It's a significant change to how the region works, marking all running games as "possibly cancelled due to lag", thus granting loss prevented to **everyone**. When an individual server/game crashes, loss prevented will not be given.
